Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.utils

Class Validator

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.utils.Validator
public class Validator extends Object
Centralized validator class for the library system.

  • Method Details

    • validateBookDetails

      public static String validateBookDetails(String title, String author, String publicationYear, String publisher)
      Validates book details.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      publicationYear - The publication year of the book.
      publisher - The publisher of the book.
      Returns:
      A validation message. If all inputs are valid, returns null.

    • validatePatronDetails

      public static String validatePatronDetails(String name, String phone, String email)
      Validates patron details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the patron.
      email - The email of the patron.
      phone - The phone number of the patron.
      Returns:
      A validation message. If all inputs are valid, returns null.

    • validateBookAndPatronForBorrowing

      public static String validateBookAndPatronForBorrowing(Book book, Patron patron) throws LibraryException
      Validates the eligibility of the book and patron for borrowing. Checks whether the book is available and the patron hasn't reached the borrowing limit.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be borrowed.
      patron - The patron borrowing the book.
      Throws:
      LibraryException - If the book or patron is not eligible for borrowing.

    • validateBookForHiding

      public static String validateBookForHiding(Book book)
      Validates if a book is eligible to be hidden in the library.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be validated for hiding.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating why the book cannot be hidden. Returns null if the book is eligible for hiding.

    • validatePatronForHiding

      public static String validatePatronForHiding(Patron patron)
      Validates if a patron is eligible to be hidden.
      Parameters:
      patron - The patron to be validated.
      Returns:
      A string message indicating why the patron cannot be hidden. Returns null if the patron is eligible for hiding.
